ComicInfo.Characters: Detective Ryan O'Mega,Liz Donnelly-Noble,Zephyr Noble,Hunter Blackthorne,Captain Dynamo (dies in this issue),Doc Noble,Mercury Blackthorne (cameo flashback),Gaia Noble,Rusty Noble (cameo flashback),Slate Blackthorne [Billy],Race Noble,Pierce Blackthorne (flashback),Widowmaker,Dr. Eichhorn,Dawn Blackthorne
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:17:35 [Issue ID 4000-131729] urn:comicvine:4000-131729 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 09:00:06. [Issue ID 290813]
ComicInfo.Summary: Oh my god, yes!: Hunter Blackthorne hires Widowmaker to kill the Nobles, but it turns out to be a setup to make the Blackthornes look good. However, Race loses his speed powers in the battle, and later recounts the story of Pierce Blackthorne's death to Liz.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Fran Bueno,Freddie E. Williams II,Gabe Bridwell,Freddie E. Williams,Fran Bueno,Freddie E. Williams
ComicInfo.Inker: Fran Bueno,Freddie E. Williams II,Gabe Bridwell,Freddie E. Williams,Fran Bueno,Freddie E. Williams
ComicInfo.Title: Oh my god, yes!
